items.title: Ellensburg
items.copy: Located on University Way, Barge's signature red brick and white stone trim are reflected in many of the buildings on campus.

context.title: CWU Campus Locations
context.copy: Our main campus is located in historic Ellensburg, Washington and we have six satellite locations across the state. Explore our locations and find the campus or center that's most convenient for you.
